thread.title: Robert Downey Jr. Cheers Up Sick Boy with 'Captain America 3' Invitation
thread.title_full: Robert Downey Jr. Cheers Up Sick Boy with 'Captain America 3' Invitation

title: Robert Downey Jr. Cheers Up Sick Boy with 'Captain America 3' Invitation
text:
Published By: MovieWeb.com: Movie News - Today 
Robert Downey Jr. issues a special message to a fan with Cystic Fibrosis, inviting him to the premiere of 'Captain America: Civil War'....
